Detailed Description

A Modifier which applies Poser joint parameters / mesh binding.

Adds a joint parameter to this binding.

Removes the provided Joint Parameter from the parameter list kept for the joint.

Parameters:
item The Joint Parameter to be removed.

Member Data Documentation

Boolean DzPoserJoint::bending

This property determines whether or not the joint parameters are applied. When off, the joint parameter has no effect on the geometry, and so the geometry can be considered weighted at 100% to its bone.
